system.effect: The attack slices clean through the arm and into the torso, drenching the ground in blood and gore. The target is killed instantly, leaving a ruined corpse on the ground. As the arm falls to the ground its fingers spasm uncontrollably, pulling the trigger of any held weapon. If the target was carrying a ranged weapon, roll 1d100. On a result of 96 or higher, a single randomly determined target within [[2d10]] metres is hit struck by a single hit from that weapon on a randomly determined Hit Location.
